nl.kb.xml.transformassert

Class TransformCompareWithTransformers

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.kb.xml.transformassert.TransformCompareWithTransformers

  • public class TransformCompareWithTransformers
extends Object
    An instance of this class is returned by TransformAssertWithTransformer.whenComparingTo(File)

    It exposes methods to declare the xml File or String to run both stylesheets against

    • Method Summary

      Declares the xml File to be transformed by both XSTL stylesheets

                                                             String... parameters)
                                                      throws FileNotFoundException,
                                                             UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                                             TransformerException
        Declares the xml File to be transformed by both XSTL stylesheets
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - the xml File
        parameters - tuples of XSLT String-parameters
        Returns:
        instance of TransformCompareWithTransformResults
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - when the XML is not found
        UnsupportedEncodingException - when the UTF-8 charset is not supported
        TransformerException - when the XML file cannot be parsed by Saxon
